Articles.Content:
Just had a thought which I haven't seen talked about...

Will anomalies be in the game? If so will the monoliths have the squad monkey logo etched on them or something else? Or would there be a variaty of monoliths with other logos?

Peace.

I would hazard a guess that anomalies will in the game.  I wouldn't expect the Squad logo on a 'monolith' equivalent, if there is one, though, but a few references to Squad and other KSP1 'history' would not surprise me.

Peace. 

I'm hoping that there aren't monoliths, maybe some around Kerbin for nostalgia, but some other kinds.

I just saw the word Anomalies and Monolith together and was thinking of something completely different until I remembered the context they have in KSP.

Still though I won't not be opposed to the former showing up ngl

9 minutes ago, Krulliam said:

I just saw the word Anomalies and Monolith together and was thinking of something completely different until I remembered the context they have in KSP.

Still though I won't not be opposed to the former showing up ngl

Wouldn't it be great if you found monoliths by have a part that 'excavated' the land for a while to reveal the monolith.

I mean you could just have a procedural system for anomalies, and spawn them at random in certain biomes. Then you could have a system similar to spore where a scanner could pick them up, or something more complex involving satellite mapping, surveys etc.

This would be a cool DLC if nothing else.
